## BasicTableColumnSelectableContext.(constructor)

Creates instance of BasicTableColumnContext

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor($implicit: TData, column: BasicTableColumn<TData>, index: number, startingIndex: number, rowSelector: RowSelector<any, any, TData>);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  $implicit | <code>TData</code> | Data of current row |
|  column | <code>BasicTableColumn&lt;TData&gt;</code> | Object of column metadata itself |
|  index | <code>number</code> | Index of rendered row in current page |
|  startingIndex | <code>number</code> | Starting index of currently displayed items |
|  rowSelector | <code>RowSelector&lt;any, any, TData&gt;</code> |  |
